nodes.text: Mon Mothma's 5 Facts was a recurring department in Star Wars Insider magazine. The department debuted in Insider 127 and also made appearances in issues 128, 129, 130, 131 and 132. The department displayed five facts about the Star Wars universe, with one of the facts being fake and the reader was invited to guess which one. The information displayed varied between Expanded Universe trivia and behind-the-scenes content.
